amendment.description: To assess and improve educator support and working conditions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2224 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2224 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Booker to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5094-5097; text: CR S5097) To assess and improve educator support and working conditions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2224 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
